attributes.action: Make all UK Restaurants/Retail shops accept card payments instead of Cash Only!
attributes.additional_details:
The last 3 restaurants I have dinned in, I had to settle the bill with cash. At no point did the staff or the business owner display any payment instructions either within the premises/website.
 
We live in a modern society where everything is digital. Contactless, mobile payments etc.
 
Please help me sign this petition so all businesses in the UK are required to accept card payments.
attributes.background: I am getting really annoyed as more and more restaurants and retail shops are refusing to take card payments as a way of settling the bill and are insisting on cash only payments.

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Iain Duncan Smith MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Chingford and Woodford Green
